document.full_text: sudan said on sunday the northern ruling party won an election for governor in the north's main oil state after a vote the south said was rigged, creating a fresh flashpoint before the south secedes in july.
document.title: sudan declares north party winner in key state vote
lines_and_colors: sudan said on sunday the northern ruling party won an election for governor in the north's main oil state after a vote the south said was rigged, creating a fresh flashpoint before the south secedes in july.
